translations: [皮肤]擦伤；[机][口腔]磨损；磨损处（abrasion 的复数）

sentences.sentence: He had severe abrasions to his right cheek.
sentences.translation: 他的右脸有几处严重擦伤。

sentences.sentence: He suffered cuts and abrasions to the face.
sentences.translation: 他的脸上有许多划伤和擦伤。

sentences.sentence: Corneal abrasions are one of the most common, but also most neglected, eye injuries.
sentences.translation: 角膜擦伤是最常见的，却也是最容易被忽视的眼部外伤。
